Posts.Content: Sep 5, 2010 08:15AM Shelley510 wrote: I got a call that they found a small mast on my left breast, after seeing my sister go through breast cancer five years ago, I am suppose to go back for more test on Wednesday.  I am a little worried but I do have Christ in my life and have been through a lot of things before. I just hope for my son and husband it is not cancer.  But am a little afraid.  I hope they at least tell me something on Wednesday.
Posts.Title: A screeching hault mintchocchip msphil
